[[File:FarmItemsScreenshots.png|thumb|400px|Left: [[Berry Master]] shop
Right: Farm items menu in [[Farm]]]] '''Farm items''' are various items usable on the [[Farm]] to help with growing, harvesting, and mutating [[berries]]. These can be bought from the [[Berry Master|Berry Masters]] of any [[region]] from [[Johto]] onwards using [[Farming Points|Farm points]] {{farmpoints}}. =Details= {| class="wikitable" |+ Farm Items |- ! Name !! Price !! Description |- | [[File:Boost_Mulch.png|20px]] Boost Mulch ||
50 {{farmpoints}} || Increases berry growth rate by 50% when applied to an occupied plot |- | [[File:Rich_Mulch.png|20px]] Rich Mulch || 100 {{farmpoints}} || Doubles the amount of berries gained from harvesting a ripe plant in the plot it is applied to |- | [[File:Surprise_Mulch.png|20px]] Surprise Mulch || 150 {{farmpoints}} || Increases the chance of berry mutations by 50% in the plot it is applied to (can be empty or occupied) |- | [[File:Amaze_Mulch.png|20px]] Amaze Mulch || 200 {{farmpoints}} || Increases all berry effects on a plot: growth and mutation rate boosted by 25%, harvest boosted by 50% |- | [[File:Berry_Shovel.png|20px]] Shovel || 300 {{farmpoints}} || Clears an occupied plot instantly (no yield) |}
